casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Darren W. BLEVINS 258P18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 24, 2018 Craig M. Cooley, Attorney at Law, Cary, for Blevins, Darren Wayne. Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, Lisa B. Finkelstein, Assistant Attorney General, Mike Miller, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 23rd of August 2018 by State of NC for Extension of Time to Respond to Petition for Writ of Certiorari:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 24th of August 2018."

State of NC shall have up to and including the 14 day of September 2018 to Respond to Petition for Writ of Certiorari.
